quote-source: Leonard Pitts Jr., Opinion: Colo. students shun gun dorm, Lawrence Journal-World, December 6, 2012.
quote-text: OK. But isn’t it also possible at least some of this preference for unleaded dorms reflects a happy outbreak of simple sanity? Is it too much to hope at least some students recognize – as the court did not – that an environment full of immature judgment, poor impulse control, overactive hormones, sexual rivalries, drug use and binge drinking is perhaps, not the best place to introduce weapons of mass destruction?
